text: Tap God agnɨgep sel kal mɨgan ayaŋ mɨdeb anɨb okok, tap kawnan yokɨp tek mɨdeb. Tap yɨbɨl God man ne alaŋ mɨdeb, tap lum awl kal mɨgan ayaŋ okok kawnan yokɨp tek mɨdeb. Pen kɨli chag meme chag bulmakaw okok pak sɨbog ñel nɨkɨm ak gek, tap kal mɨgan anɨb okok suŋtep yek God nɨgek tep gɨnɨmuŋ. Ak tek ak tap yɨbɨl God man ne alaŋ mɨdeb okok, suŋtep yek God nɨgek tep gɨnɨmuŋ agɨl, tap teplep yɨbɨl olap ke sɨbog God nop ñɨnɨmuŋ.
